page.title: 13Mabe's Shopping Facilities
page.content: {Mabe's}village shops consists of a newsagents and tobacconists owned by{ {Brian}and{Joyce Jowett}and two general stores.One of the general stores which is owned by{Bill}and{Barbara Gates}has an off licence.The other which is called{Mace}has a post office and hairdresses.{Mace}is very useful for if you have run out of butter or squash,etc but is not big enough for weekly shopping.{Mabe}also has butchers,greengrocers, fish mongers and bakers,who all come around in their mobile vans.
